Gentoo Linux

Pros

  • Rolling release1).
  • Native non SystemD init system (openrc).
  • Independent distribution.
  • Big community and amount of packages2) + pentesting tools3).
  • Text installation.
  • Extremely minimalistic (CFLAGS).
  • The widest processor architecture support4).
  • Multiple C libraries support (glibc, musl).
  • FSF separation via licenses.
  • Documentation5).

Cons

  • Time consuming.
